package.description:
Just like in the movie, Megamaid can either vacuum up information (other software frameworks refer to this as "logging") or it can reverse directions and blow all the data back where it came from (otherwise known as "playback").
The executables you need are in the "bin" directory of this package. Launch them without any parameters to see a syntax reference.
If the reference still doesn't make sense, please go watch the Spaceballs movie again.
